text: Does Pat still work at subway/did he ever really? Pat serving customers seems like fertile ground for some comics, but we never saw ny.

text: So he thanks Vlad but not Roast Beef?  Fuck Pat, man!  Fuck him in the ear!

text:
Man, that fixation on business ownership. That *is* Pat.

And fuck him in the ear.

name: dasilodavi
text: Uh, I mean apologizes.  Is there any way to delete posts?  Like, this one and the one preceding it?

name: atmus
text: No.  Your shame, much like urine is on the internet where, much like the community pool, it will stay.  Forever.

text: Amen

text:
Oh yeah, baby, me and you are gonna get our bo- URK URGGHHH UGK

name: gouldgonewild

name: zapatos
text:
on tine mah gurfrend wrotes me a sooper sex-e txt msgs. o bby so hott an sexi an yes o o o yes i lyke it so much ok. Something like that anyway.

I told her, "I would be so turned on babe, but your grammar is atrocious." We broke up shortly there after.

name: anticitizen
text: i once dated a girl where every few days she'd send me an email utilizing the wrong use of your/you're.  i'd just stare at the error, eyes twitching every few seconds, for hours.

name: zapatos
text:
Oh man, I hate seeing that mistake.

I'm so sorry.

text: I am not sure if it is my favorite arc but it is the one I would enjoy most as a movie. That's not even true, but the Great Outdoor Fight can't be fairly counted because it throws off the scale.
